posts.title: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5 B
posts.slug: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5-B
posts.permalink: andymo.top/2019/08/24/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5-B/
posts.text: 树形dp 1，2，3分别代表三种颜色$$f[u][1]+=max(f[v][2],f[v][3])$$ $$f[u][2]+=max(f[v][1],f[v][3])$$ $$f[u][3]+=max(f[v][1],f[v][2])$$ 大概是道板子题 代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 100005int n,en;int front[N],x[N],y[N],z[N];ll f[N][4];struct edge{ int v,next;}e[N<<1];il void add(int u,int v){ en++; e[en].v=v; e[en].next=front[u]; front[u]=en;}void dfs(int u,int fa){ f[u][1]=x[u]; f[u][2]=y[u]; f[u][3]=z[u]; for(re int i=front[u];i;i=e[i].next){ int v=e[i].v; if(v==fa) continue; dfs(v,u); f[u][1]+=max(f[v][2],f[v][3]); f[u][2]+=max(f[v][1],f[v][3]); f[u][3]+=max(f[v][1],f[v][2]); }}int main(){ int u,v; read(n); for(re int i=1;i<=n-1;i++) in2(u,v),add(u,v),add(v,u); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++) in3(x[i],y[i],z[i]); dfs(1,1); printf("%lld",max(f[1][1],max(f[1][2],f[1][3]))); return 0;}

posts.title: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5 A
posts.slug: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5 A
posts.path: 2019/08/24/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5 A/
posts.permalink: andymo.top/2019/08/24/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组5 A/
posts.text: 自己瞎搞的代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 100005int n;ll a[N],s[N];int main(){ ll sum=0; read(n); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++){ readl(a[i]); sum+=a[i]*i; } for(re int i=n;i>=1;i--) s[i]=s[i+1]+a[i]; ll ans=sum,l=0,r=sum; for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++){ l+=a[i]*i; r-=s[i]; ans=min(ans,l+r); } printf("%lld",ans); return 0;} 还搞了个后缀… 正解： 第一部分的数组为$ 1a[1]+2a[2]+..+k*a[k] $,可处理前缀和。 第二部分的数组为$ (i-k+1)a[i]+(i-k+2)a[i+1]+…+(n-k)a[n] $，提取出$ -k(a[i]+a[i+1]+…a[n]) $，发现和上面相同，都是下标乘以数组元素的前缀和。 代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 100005int n;ll a[N],s[N],sum[N];int main(){ read(n); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++){ readl(a[i]); s[i]=s[i-1]+a[i]; sum[i]=sum[i-1]+a[i]*i; } ll ans=sum[n]; for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++){ ans=min(ans,sum[n]-(s[n]-s[i])*i); } printf("%lld",ans); return 0;}

posts.title: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 D
posts.slug: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 D
posts.path: 2019/08/23/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 D/
posts.permalink: andymo.top/2019/08/23/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 D/
posts.text: 不差分前缀和70，部分分也太多了8 差分 模拟 每个三角形的每一行的首尾打上差分标记 时间复杂度 $ O(1e8) $ 代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 1005int n;ll map[N][N];int main(){ int opt,x,y,l,c; read(n); while(n--){ read(opt); in4(x,y,l,c); if(opt==1){ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x+i][y]+=c; map[x+i][y+l+1-i]-=c; } } else if(opt==2){ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x+i][y-l+i]+=c; map[x+i][y+1]-=c; } } else if(opt==3){ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x-i][y]+=c; map[x-i][y+l+1-i]-=c; } } else{ for(re int i=0;i<=l;i++){ map[x-i][y-l+i]+=c; map[x-i][y+1]-=c; } } } ll ans=-1e17; for(re int i=1;i<=1000;i++){ for(re int j=1;j<=1000;j++){ map[i][j]+=map[i][j-1]; ans=max(ans,map[i][j]); } } printf("%lld",ans); return 0;}

posts.title: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 C
posts.slug: 牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 C
posts.path: 2019/08/23/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 C/
posts.permalink: andymo.top/2019/08/23/牛客NOIP暑期七天营-普及组4 C/
posts.text: 反正我输出无解24分 贪心 判断是否可行： 任意两点（已知的点）曼哈顿距离*d >= 两点价值之差的绝对值 ​ 丢进小根堆，价值小的先 每次取堆顶，四向扩展，标记，可保证正确性 代码： 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include<cstdio>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>#include<queue>using namespace std;namespace io{ #define re register #define ll long long #define inf 0x3f3f3f3f #define il inline #define in1(a) read(a) #define in2(a,b) in1(a),in1(b) #define in3(a,b,c) in2(a,b),in1(c) #define in4(a,b,c,d) in2(a,b),in2(c,d) il void readl(ll &x){ x=0;ll f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; } il void read(int &x){ x=0;int f=1;char c=getchar(); while(c<'0'||c>'9'){if(c=='-')f=-f;c=getchar();} while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){x=x*10+c-'0';c=getchar();} x*=f; }}using namespace io;#define N 2005int h,w,n,d;const int dir[4][2]={{1,0},{0,1},{-1,0},{0,-1}};const int mod=1e9+7;struct node{ int x,y,c; bool operator <(const node &rhs) const{ return c>rhs.c; }}a[N];int dis(int i,int j){ return abs(a[i].x-a[j].x)+abs(a[i].y-a[j].y);} ll map[N][N];bool vis[N][N];priority_queue <node> q;int main(){ in4(h,w,n,d); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++) in3(a[i].x,a[i].y,a[i].c); for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++){ for(re int j=i+1;j<=n;j++){ if(dis(i,j)*d<abs(a[i].c-a[j].c)){ puts("PitayaCrying"); return 0; } } } for(re int i=1;i<=n;i++) q.push(a[i]); while(!q.empty()){ node now=q.top(); q.pop(); if(vis[now.x][now.y]) continue; vis[now.x][now.y]=1; map[now.x][now.y]=now.c; for(re int i=0;i<4;i++){ int nx=now.x+dir[i][0],ny=now.y+dir[i][1]; if(nx<1||nx>h||ny<1||ny>w||vis[nx][ny]) continue; q.push((node){nx,ny,now.c+d}); } } ll ans=0; for(re int i=1;i<=h;i++){ for(re int j=1;j<=w;j++){ ans=(ans+map[i][j])%mod; } } printf("%lld",ans); return 0;}

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new postpost1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
